languages.text: {n}Стоит вам лишь коснуться внутренней проводки алтаря, как суровый машинный дух направляет в ваши пальцы мощный разряд электричества. Он явно не потерпит столь непочтительного нарушения ритуала эксплуатации.{/n}

{n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам лишь коснуться внутренней проводки алтаря, как суровый машинный дух направляет в ваши пальцы мощный разряд электричества. Он явно не потерпит столь непочтительного нарушения ритуала эксплуатации.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this irreverent violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

{n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this irreverent violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

{n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this irreverent violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

{n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

{n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald du die innere Verkabelung des Altars berührst, schickt der strenge Maschinengeist eine starke elektrische Entladung in deine Finger. Der Geist wird diesen blasphemistischen Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual nicht dulden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald du die innere Verkabelung des Altars berührst, schickt der strenge Maschinengeist eine starke elektrische Entladung in deine Finger. Der Geist wird diesen unverfrorenen Verstoß gegen das Betriebsritual nicht dulden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès que vous touchez les câbles à l'intérieur de l'autel, l'esprit de la machine envoie dans vos doigts une puissante décharge électrique. L'esprit refuse catégoriquement cette profanation du Rite d'Opération.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que vous touchez les câbles à l'intérieur de l'autel, l'esprit de la machine envoie dans vos doigts une puissante décharge électrique. L'esprit refuse catégoriquement cette profanation du Rite d'Opération.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚刚触摸到祭坛的内部电线，手指就传来了一阵猛烈的电击。机魂容不得对操作仪典的任何亵渎之举。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚触摸到祭坛的内部电线，手指就传来了一阵猛烈的电击。机魂容不得对操作仪典的任何不敬之举。{/n}

languages.text: {n}祭壇の中にあるワイヤーの束に触れた途端、厳格な機械精霊が指に強い電力を放った。精霊は、任務の儀礼を冒涜するような非礼な違反行為を受け入れはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭壇の中にあるワイヤーの束に触れた途端、厳格な機械精霊が指に強い電力を放った。精霊は、稼働の儀式に対するこれほど非礼な違反行為を受け入れはしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto tocas el cableado interior del altar, el espíritu máquina de popa envía una poderosa descarga eléctrica a tus dedos. El espíritu rechaza bruscamente esta violación blasfema del Rito de Operación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto tocas el cableado interior del altar, el espíritu máquina de popa envía una poderosa descarga eléctrica a tus dedos. El espíritu rechaza bruscamente esta violación irreverente del Rito de Operación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sunağın bağrındaki kablolara dokunduğun anda makine ruhu, parmaklarına kuvvetli bir elektrik akımı gönderiyor. Belli ki Faaliyet Ayini'ne yapılan bu kâfirce ihlale hiçbir şekilde müsamahası yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the altar's inner wirework, the stern machine spirit sends a powerful electric discharge into your fingers. The spirit will have none of this blasphemous violation of the Rite of Operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sunağın kablolarına dokunduğun anda makine ruhu, parmaklarına doğru kuvvetli bir elektrik salınımı gönderiyor. Ruh, Faaliyet Ayini'ne yapılan bu kâfirce saldırıya katiyen müsamaha göstermiyor.{/n}
